sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import Input from './Input'
import { Playground } from 'docz'
import { ThemeProvider } from 'styled-components'
import { theme } from '../../styles/themes';

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"input"}}>{`Input`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basic-usage"}}>{`Basic usage`}</MDXTag>
<ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
    <Input />
</ThemeProvider>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-js","metaString":""}}>{`<Input />
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"props"}}>{`Props`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"type"}}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="h4">{`type`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The type attribute specifies the type of input field.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`type: string`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"placeholder"}}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="h4">{`placeholder`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The placeholder attribute specifies the placeholder of input field.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`type: string`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"color"}}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="h4">{`color`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`It define the input field color.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`type: string`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`primary`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`danger`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`info`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`success`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`default`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"withbutton"}}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="h4">{`withButton`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You should use this prop when you want to show a button on the input field side.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`type: bool`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={1} __code={`<ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
  <Input
    color="success"
    buttonIcon="arrow-right2"
    buttonIconColor="white"
    rounded="md"
    onClickButton={() => {
      alert(\'prop onClick of Button component\')
    }}
    withButton
  />
</ThemeProvider>`} __scope={{props,Input,ThemeProvider,theme}}>
    <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
        <Input
            color="success"
            buttonIcon="arrow-right2"
            buttonIconColor="white"
            rounded="md"
            onClickButton={() => { alert('prop onClick of Button component') }}
            withButton
        />
    </ThemeProvider>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"onchange"}}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="h4">{`onChange`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You should use this props when you want to dispatch a action by each letter typed.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`type: function`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"handleclickbutton"}}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="h4">{`handleClickButton`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You should use this props when you to want to dispatch an action when you clicked on the button.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`type: function`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
